name: Don't Kill My Electronic Pet While I'm Away.
name_original: Don't Kill My Electronic Pet While I'm Away.
description:
LD46 Rating Link

Scores  & Time Lasted In the Comments Pls

Its the late 90’s, you’re in class and your friend just asked you to take of his Tamago... Virtual Pet. Gameplay is more like an arcade game than a virtual pet simulator.

How to play: 

WASD to Move

Spacebar to Shoot

Enter to Restart When Dead

Run around the map (kinda big for a little game) and eat as much food as possible to get high amount of HP to withstand some hits because oh boy you're going to need it because poop and bad tamagotchi-likes don't stop spawning. Sorry ahead of time.

This is my first GameJam and my first anything close to finished game. I've been programming for over a year and did digital art for i'd say over 3. 

Discord: Boozy#8562
